1.content:
You're a 17 year old boy with average intelligence, average looks and average physique. All in all you're incredibly average. The thing about that, however is that it gave you what some would call a curse and others would call a blessing. You are essentially invisible to people unless you talk to them first. After experimentation you discovered that after talking to someone you have a 15 minute "grace" period where that person can see you completely.

Your invisibility also only seems to disable against the person you're trying to communicate with, so if anyone overhears they still can't see you. You had gotten through your life with simple planning and attentiveness but now that highschool is almost done you decided that it's about time you have some fun with your powers!


Today your plan was to...

A: Go to school on the bus in the back corner, insuring that at least one person will sit right on you.
B: Go to school by walking so you'll actually get there unimpeded.
C: Take a bath to start the day off right. Unfortunately (Or fortunately) someone walks in on you and sits right on your lap.
D: Go to the mall because it was a weekend and a day off from school.
E: Others?
1.title: The Invisible Man.

11.content:
you walk on to the bus and make your way to the back when...





1 you sit down in the back corner
2 you stumble and fall on to the middle seat with your face as the cushion
3 you lay down on the back row because you did not remember that it was the next stop most people got on
11.title: Back of the Bus.

13.content:
You decide to take a bath before school time, not only for the reason of relaxing but also to get someone to sit on you naked. As you entered the bathroom you closed and locked the door behind you for now and plugged the bath drain. You then filled up the bath with warm water.
Before you re-entered the bath however, you decided to unlock the door and leave it wide open, pulling the shower curtain back and removing all evidence of you being there besides the full bath.

You lounge around while keeping your eyes on the door when _____ walked in with a pair of extra clothes and a towel around their neck.

A: Your Gorgeous Mom, 45 years old
B: Your Older Sister, 21 years old
C: Your Younger Brother, 10 years old
D: Your Female Cousin who is also 17.
E: Your 6 Year Old Brother who is just starting to take baths by himself.
13.title: Bath time is Interrupted.

131.content:
Your plan seemed to have worked perfectly as your mom walked into the washroom with a towel around her neck and some extra clothes on her arms. She had probably come to take a shower but upon seeing the full bath, she called out around the house.

"HEY! WAS ANYONE GOING TO TAKE A BATH?"

Responses ranging from "Nope" and "Later" rang throughout the house. Your mother remembered who you were and called out towards the bath for you, telling you to tell her you were there. You wanted her to not know about you so you stayed silent. Your mother just shrugged it off, assuming that someone had gotten the bath ready for her and forgot to tell her.

Right before your eyes, your mother started to take off all her clothes, starting from her shirt and pants and then moving onto her underwear and panties. Your mother was buck naked right in front of your eyes. Of course, this wasn't the first time this had happened but before this, you had always told her you were there before she got too far.

Your mother stepped into the bath and surprisingly right over you. Of course, you were dulled to the pain anyways so it wouldn't have mattered to you. All of a sudden, your mother dropped right onto your stomach with her ass, making you feel as though the entire set up was worth it. Your mothers ass on your stomach made your dick incredibly hard and again, your mother didn't even register your presence.

You were basking in the feeling of your mother's ass when suddenly...

A: You heard snoring, your mother had fallen asleep on you therefor trapping you in the bath.
B: Your mother stood back up after successfully finishing her bath.
C: You decided to take care of your erection, but in the process, you called out your mom's name and made an extremely awkward situation.
131.title: Oh Mama.

choices: Under the Slide in the Indoor Park.
14.content:
There's a bunch of things you could do in the mall when you make full use of your ability! Where do you decide to check out first?

A: Clothing Store. A bunch of naked women changing right in front of you sounds like a good idea to you!
B: Bathroom. Same Concept as before but this time maybe people can shit inside your mouth if you put your face on the toilet.
C: Under the slide in the Indoor park. In you put your face where children end up a bunch of them could end up sitting on your face. Free Butt Service!
D: Female Only Gym: You could sit or lie on the gym equipment while sweaty buff women sit and lie right on top you you.
E: Others?
14.title: Mall Fun.

141.content:
You decide to head over to the nearby Victoria's Secret. Normally, guys who entered here alone would be met with suspicious looks but considering the fact that you were invisable, you were able to walk right on in. You went to the end of the store and saw a couple of change rooms, a couple occupied and a couple not. You crawl under one of the occupied change rooms and see a gorgeous woman completely naked. She doesn't even acknowledge your presence as you stare at her from below.

After a second of staring you stand up and decide to sit on the little bench right next to her. She nonchalantly changed panties, unknowingly giving a lucky teenager the best strip tease of his life. All of a sudden without anything on but a pair of lingerie she sits on your lap and stretches, further grinding into your pelvis. After a bit of this, she stands up and puts her clothes back on, before leaving the store. You had gotten exactly what you had come for but you could always go for more?
141.title: The ultimate peeping Tom.

1411.content: You decide to wait for the person to enter the room. After a short moment, who walks in?
1411.title: Go for more!

143.content:
You decide to just lie down under the slide in the indoor park with your legs under the slide and your face right where kids land. Not only is it super easy to get into position, but you also can just stay still while young kids sit on your face, maybe even babies with diapers.

After checking to make sure no one will interrupt you by sliding down while you're getting in the position you weave around everyone and lie down in front of the slide, sliding into position. Almost instantaneously you hear the sounds of kids banging their feet while running towards the slide, and you prepare yourself. The first kid that comes down is wearing shorts. He lands right on your face with his ass, your nose digging right into his asscrack. As expected, he didn't even notice you and walked off. Just that experience alone made you excited as all heck and made the effort to come here all worth it.

The next person to come down is...

A: A kid in a diaper, and it's pretty damn full. Prepare for squashed poop on your face.
B: A Little girl wearing a skirt. You end up getting a face full of her kiddie panties.
C: No one. It seems the indoor park just closed and now you're alone there.
143.title: Under the Slide in the Indoor Park.
